title: S12 Ep15: Ghost Theory: Examining a Haunting
itunes:title: Ghost Theory: Examining a Haunting
description:
Beyond The Darkness welcomes Author/Researcher/Professor Loyd Auerbach as we talk about the topic of ghosts, where they originate from, What are they made from, and other origins.

Loyd Auerbach: http://www.parapsych.org/users/profparanormal/profile.aspx
